actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution elimination of illegal drug traffic.

summary.text: Expresses the Sense of Congress that the President should: (1) issue a proclamation declaring a war on the increasing illegal drug traffic in this Nation; (2) convene the National Security Council to devise a strategy to combat the drug menace; (3) direct the Drug Enforcement Administration to report to the President and Congress on the status of the importation of drugs; (4) direct the Secretary of State to urge foreign nations to halt drug trafficking; and (5) if necessary, seek from Congress authority to terminate all foreign assistance to drug-producing nations.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution elimination of illegal drug traffic.
